name: Prisoner #3774
description:
Art and visuals - Luke Vincent

Game programming and AI - Alex Carney and Tejan Singh

Level Design - Luke Vincent and Tejan Singh

Music - Alex Carney

Characters - Luke Vincent

An unlocked cell in the Galaxy's most secure prison outpost gives prisoner #3774 the chance to escape and once again satisfy his bloodlust on the galactic population...

Avoid detection by the robot guards and find and escape pod.

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - crouch
